live_updates: Our crews have restored services to the area. Thank you for your patience!

Technicians continue to work to restore service as quickly possible. However, due to the nature of the repairs involved, we expect that this will take a few hours. We will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available.
On-site technicians continue working diligently to resolve this outage.
Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
58445.summary: Some customers in Salt Spring Island are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
58445.title: Feb 28 - Salt Spring Island | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
